name: The Blacksmith (LD)
description:
## This is a LD40 submission made in 3 days

This is a surreal blacksmith simulator. Make life yours. You got it.

There are multiple boss fights.

How to Play Anvil: make money Green Button: [ACCEPT] Red Button: [DECLINE]

Gamepad(XBOX) RECOMMENDED

KEYBOARD CONTROLS: WASD - MOVEMENT MOUSE/IJKL - CAMERA HU - HAMMERS N - RESTART IF YOU GET STUCK ESC - ESC

the cool song in there is:

Feelings of Twilight by ShadyDave

https://soundcloud.com/shady-dave-2/feelings-of-twilight

Audio is important to the gameplay:

If audio doesn’t run you might be missing OpenAL. It’s a pretty quick download and it’s free. https://www.openal.org/downloads/ (Installer)
